Class CmsImageFileManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesmanager.core.business.modules.cms.product.local.CmsImageFileManagerImpl

    ImageGet, ImageRemove, ProductImageGet, ProductImagePut, ProductImageRemove

    public class CmsImageFileManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProductImagePut, ProductImageGet, ProductImageRemove
    Manager for storing and deleting image files from the CMS which is a web server Manages - Product images
    Author:
    Carl Samson
